channel.title: 317- Questions
channel.description: Ok, so I am using a 317 client. Whenever any player clicks the icon to open up a prayer menu, the whole client nulls. I am sure there is a way to fix it, and YES, I did use the search function first... If somone has a link to the right thread thats fine. EDIT- Also, I was wondering if there was a way to make an item spawn on the ground by a command? Example, you type a command, and it spawns diffrent items around, like a drop party.

item.title: 317- Questions
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("spawnitem") { int Item = command.substring(###); //I'm not going to give you whole code, fill this part in ItemHandler.addItem(Item, absX, ####, Item, playerId, false); // fill #s in, I'm not giving full code. }
